(:action pour ; Handle the process of preparing and serving a drink
:parameters (?p - player ?item - ingredient ?bl - blender ?g - glass ?st - garnishment)
:precondition (and 
    (inventory ?p ?item) 
    (at ?bl kitchen) 
    (at ?p kitchen) 
    (smooth_mixture ?bl)
    (chilled ?g)
    (inventory ?p ?st)
)
:effect (and 
    (in ?item ?bl) 
    (in ?item ?g) 
    (garnished ?g) 
    (not (inventory ?p ?item))

(:action blend
  ; Blend ingredients to create a mixture
  :parameters (?p - player ?bl - blender ?ingredient - object)
  :precondition (and (at ?p kitchen) (in ?ingredient ?bl) (not (smooth_mixture ?bl)) (power_off ?bl))
  :effect (and (smooth_mixture ?bl) (power_on ?bl) (not (power_off ?bl))
